item.title: Argentina’s Crypto Scandal Swindled Thousands. What Did Javier Milei Know?
item.description: A new cryptocurrency called $Libra bilked investors out of $250 million. It had been promoted by President Javier Milei.

item.title: Strike Brings Greece to a Halt: No Trains, No Planes and Huge Protests
item.description: Two years after the country’s deadliest rail disaster, many are still demanding greater safety and accountability.

item.title: As Phase One of the Israel-Gaza Truce Winds Down, What’s Next?
item.description: Israeli forces are supposed to begin withdrawing from the Philadelphi Corridor, a sensitive border zone between Gaza and Egypt, this weekend.

item.title: After Insults and False Claims, Trump to Host Zelensky for Minerals Deal

item.title: Who Is the P.K.K. Leader Abdullah Ocalan?
